description:
Old style Family Man of Discipline, Handsome Libra, 49, Good Dad, blond, blue eyes, 5’10”. I like chocolate ice cream, making passionate love to my woman at home, cooking and eating food with her.
I have passion for tall or average height Brunette woman, Big Lips, wide hip, soft submissive woman who wants more than anything else to be a good wife and mother, and is eager to please and comfort her man. Prefer Aquarius or Gemini 18 - 30 submissive to my needs, loyal, traditional, respectful, responsible, has kindness, is serious woman.
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
